statements: SELECT * FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_date FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM customer_transactions;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id
SELECT transaction_date, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 123 GROUP BY transaction_date ORDER BY transaction_date
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY customer_id, transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount < 500 GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 3
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;

SELECT customer_name, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.customer_id = t.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_spent > 2000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM Customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transaction WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, product_price, product_category FROM Product ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer INNER JOIN Transaction ON Customer.customer_id = Transaction.customer_id;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount, transaction_description FROM Transaction INNER JOIN Customer ON Transaction.customer_id = Customer.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, transaction_date, transaction_amount, product_name FROM Customer INNER JOIN Transaction ON Customer.customer_id = Transaction.customer_id INNER JOIN Product ON Transaction.product_id = Product.product_id;

SELECT customer_name, customer_phone, product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Customer INNER JOIN Transaction ON Customer.customer_id = Transaction.customer_id INNER JOIN Product ON Transaction.product_id = Product.product_id WHERE Product.product_category = 'Electronics';

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM Customer INNER JOIN Transaction ON Customer.customer_id = Transaction.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, customer_email ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id < 10 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, c.first_name, c.lastjsonmae,tp.product_name, tp.unit_price FROM transactions t INNER JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id INNER JOIN products tp ON tp.product_id = t.product_id WHERE t.transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT SUM(subtotal) AS total_revenue FROM order_items JOIN orders ON order_items.order_id = orders.order_id WHERE orders.order_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT products.product_name, unit_price, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN order_items ON products.product_id = order_items.product_id GROUP BY products.product_name, unit_price;

SELECT order_id, customer_name, product_name, quantity, subtotal FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
